description: The Nordsman Light is an inspired, lightweight flannel built for brisk mornings and temperate days. It carries the same durability-focused build as our classic Nordsman Flannel, without sacrificing comfort. Constructed from an Organic Cotton/Repreve® Recycled Polyester blend, it’s butter-soft and a versatile road staple for most occasions.
name: Roark Nordsman Light Woven LS - Mens
